attributes.action: Reduce crime, HIV and other infections, And reduce the cost to the taxpayers by expanding heroin perscribing nationwide and opening heroin maintence clinics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current treatments for addicts are not best for addicts or society as a whole.

Heroin addiction is a health problem and should be treated as such, addicts should be free to obtain perscriptions for heroin from their doctor.

These should allow addicts to recieve as much heroin as they require from specialised clinics able to provide heroin and sterile injection equipment, where it will be consumed on site to prevent leakage to the illicit market.

This will reduce HIV etc and also reduce aquisitive crime, Heroin maintence is more effective than current programs.

The savings in crime & criminal justice costs will cover the treatment costs.

Addicts treated in this way will be able to rejoin the workforce with help and councelling returning from a life of crime and become active members of society once more.

This will benifit the addicts themselves and society as a whole by ensuring addicts are treated with dignity, health and crime costs are reduced.
